msContents.summary: Observances (vrata), rites, and worship (pūjā) performed on the night of the full moon for the purpose of removing sins and obtaining the fruits of ones endeavors. Includes anointing with clarified butter (ghee), offering of rice, and fire.

msItem.title: Battisīpaurṇimāvratodyāpana
बत्तिसीपौर्णिमाव्रतोद्यापन
msItem.colophon: Colophon: iti bhaviṣyottarapurāṇe kṛṣṇayaśodāsaṃvāde battiśīpaurṇimāvratodyāpanaṃ samāptaṃ // bhāryayādvātriṃśatpaurṇamāsīvratācaritasya umāmaheśvaraprītaye kṛtasya ghṛtātkavrīhimayapiṣṭadīpaprajvalanasya saṃpūrṇaphalāvāptaye tat kalpoktavidhinānadudyāpanākhyaṃ karmakariṣye // bhiḍe ity upanāmakapadyākareṇa likhitaṃ // śake 1712 sādhāraṇanāmasaṃvatsare dakṣiṇāpane śara[?]dṛtaukārtike māsiśuklapakṣe ca [?]rdaśyāṃ tithau maṃdavāsare puṃṇyagrāme likhitaṃ // svārthaṃ paropakārārthaṃ ca // (f. 2v).
